title: He and I
description: He and I is the story of God in the life of Gabrielle Bossis (1874â€“1950), a French woman, and the journey of her relationship with Eternal Love. A timeless work in which the reader shares a touching and profound experience through the words Bossis heard in the depths of her being and recorded. He and I provides a joyous spiritual feast for all seekers of the One who seeks us out in our day-to-day life.
author: Gabrielle Bossis
